name: Gameboy Advance Video Dragon Half Dub Episodes
name_original: Gameboy Advance Video Dragon Half Dub Episodes
description:
For this,here is a Classic Anime OVA for the 90´s show called:Dragon Half only 2 episodes on english dubbed converted in Gameboy advance video. 

the story is full of funny gags,romance and a little fantasy parody generically for the 90´s,but if you wanna see the full story till the end,i recommend you to read the Dragon Half Manga that had all the more character and gag´s to read !

If you like it ,check my other gba video like it ,share it with your friends and Enjoy!
